name: All Alone (bitsbybrad)
description:
Rhythmic Procedural Platformer.

Try to survive all the way to the end of the song.
The more platforms you touch the higher your score, but at a higher chance of death.

First solo game I've ever made. This was made for Ludem Dare 47!

All Art, Music, and Code by me. Baz James - @bitsbybrad

Thanks for stopping by!
